coreAtributes.name: Orichalcum Cock Ring
coreAtributes.description: A cock ring embedded with a ring of the highly enchantable material; orichalcum.

displacementText.playerSelf: You work the cock ring off your penis.
displacementText.playerNPC: You work the ring off [npc.Name]'s penis.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You painfully yank [npc.name]'s cock ring off [npc.herHis] penis.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] works the ring off your penis.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] painfully yanks your cock ring off your penis.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] painfully yanks the cock ring off [npc2.name]'s penis.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slide the cock ring down to the base of your penis.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slide the cock ring down to the base of [npc.name]'s penis.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You slide the cock ring down to the base of [npc.name]'s penis.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides the cock ring down to the base of [npc.herHis] penis.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides the cock ring down to the base of your penis.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] slides the cock ring down to the base of your penis.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slides the cock ring down to the base of [npc2.Name]'s penis.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] slides the cock ring down to the base of [npc2.Name]'s penis.
